name: Submarine Clean
description:
Hello There, this is my first official released game and I hope you enjoy it.

Submarine Game is a game where a submarine is underwater and you, who will be playing as the submarine, will have to pick up as much trash as you can to refill your fuel (hp), but you must avoid the fish as best as you can, or you'll lose more fuel.

Comment how much trash you were able to pick up.

I really hope you enjoy this game. It's coded in python (game engine- pygame). It's part of the Seajam.

screenshot 3 by DesignEvo logo maker
